name: Home-Run Hero
description:
Inspired by Learn to Fly, this game is a baseball version of the progression based platforms we all know and love, I made this game for studies and just posting it so anyone can enjoy this absolute masterpiece of a game. With stunning graphics, completely original character design and gameplay, you are sure to be blown away. 

Game was made using Processing 3.5 so you have to download the according file and Run the executable game file inside.
